lead_paragraph: ATLANTA (AP) — Jamont Gordon scored 23 points and Mississippi State survived a scary weather delay during overtime to beat Alabama, 69-67, in the Southeastern Conference tournament quarterfinals Friday night.
snippet: ATLANTA (AP) — Jamont Gordon scored 23 points and Mississippi State survived a scary weather delay during overtime to beat Alabama, 69-67, in the Southeastern Conference tournament quarterfinals Friday night.
